articles.title: Maggie Haberman: This is how Trump likely has been consuming the Jan. 6 hearings - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN political analyst Maggie Haberman describes what she has heard about former President Donald Trump's consumption of the January 6 House select committee hearings in light of ex-Trump White House counsel Pat Cipollone's testimony with the committee.

articles.title: Video: Gunman's father claims no responsibility over shooting - CNN Video
articles.description: Robert Crimo Jr., the father of the confessed Highland Park parade shooter, says he thought his son was going to use the guns he helped purchase at the shooting range.

articles.author: Casey Tolan and Daniel A. Medina, CNN
articles.title: Highland Park gunman's family was in turmoil for years leading up to parade shooting

articles.title: Musk tells Twitter he wants out of deal to buy it. Twitter says it will force him to close the sale

articles.title: The 8-year-old boy paralyzed from waist down after Highland Park parade shooting woke up and asked to see his twin and dog
articles.description: An 8-year-old boy who was attending the Highland Park Fourth of July parade with his parents and twin brother was shot and is now paralyzed from the waist down, family spokesperson Anthony Loizzi told CNN on Thursday.

articles.title: Here's what's in Biden's executive order on abortion rights
articles.description: President Joe Biden on Friday signed an executive order aimed at protecting access to reproductive health services in the wake of the Supreme Court overturning Roe v. Wade and eliminating the constitutional right to an abortion.

articles.title: New York Post: Father of Highland Park gunman wants his son to serve a 'long' sentence
articles.description: Days after a gunman killed seven and wounded dozens more in a rampage at a Fourth of July parade in Highland Park, Illinois, the shooter's father told the New York Post he wants his son to serve a long prison sentence.

articles.author: Holly Yan, CNN
articles.title: The woman who planned her synagogue's funerals was killed in the Highland Park massacre. Now a friend embarks on an unimaginable task
articles.description: At first, the grief-stricken congregation didn't know who would take the reins from Jacki Sundheim and plan her synagogue funeral with the same tenacity and care that she always bestowed onto others.
articles.content:
Glencoe, Illinois (CNN)Anytime there was a major life event at her synagogue, Jacki Sundheim was on top of it. 
The 63-year-old meticulously planned virtually every bar mitzvah, bat mitzvah, wedding… [+2858 chars]

articles.author: CNN Staff
articles.title: Who was Shinzo Abe, the former Japanese Prime Minister?
articles.description: Japan's former Prime Minister Shinzo Abe has died after being shot during a campaign speech Friday in Nara, central Japan. He was 67.
